_Material<Pepper, 6>.notes: Try your best to not eat. Eat shrooms and herbs down to 3 for food

Fairy Fountain.notes: Eat shroom and herbs down to 3. Get 2 fairies, 3 endura, 3 princess, 5 nightshades (6 nightshates total)

Break 10 slots.notes: Eat shroom down to 1. Drop 1 shroom, nightshade, princess, herb. Break 5 with shroom, nightshade, princess, herb, apple. Pick up everything Break 5 with everything but carrots

.!!(CHECK STAR TAB).notes: If cursor on star, good. If cursor not on star but can menu to undiscovered tab. Go to material tab, unpause, pause, go to material tab, unpause, pause, check star again. Repeat until you have star. If you can't menu to undiscovered tab, slot breaking didn't work.

Kakariko WMC: (==) All Prompt Entaglement used in this run are column 1. Go to 1 tab to the right or 2 tabs to the left of target tab. Go to column 5 and the row below the target row (3 for arrow, 2 for rest). Do right stick left, dpad up, right stick right, dpad left (RSL-DU-RSR-DL). Then go 2 tabs to the left, wait for cursor to appear, press DL. Then DR-DL-DL-DR. Now you can only scroll tabs in multiples of 3. Go to the source item, go to system, go back (R then L), scroll to target item, activate prompt

Unpause, equip bomb arrow.notes: Do this so glider goes to slot 1 and we don't need to memorize another magic sequence

.!!(Sync GameData).notes: By pressing dpad quick menu or open and close inventory

_Cook<WMC Meal>.notes: Entangle material tab with last roasted endura carrot. Press X-AAAA to hold 4, Press X to unhold, Press X-AAA to hold 3, Unpause, pause, hold fairy and nightshade, cook

.!!(Sync GameData).notes: By pressing dpad quick menu or open and close inventory

Kakariko WMC: (==) We now have corrupted roast endura carrot carrying WMC data. Confirm this by checking if you have 4 tabs of food, 3 full tab and 1 roasted endura carrot at the end. We will now setup inventory for corruption

SAVE.notes: This is the base save to corrupt

Eat 2 roasted carrots.notes: This is so that the 999 stack can load in

Kakariko WMC: (==) Corruption done. The base save now has corrupted bomb arrows, fairy, endura food, and carrots and princess for WMC. We will now setup the inventory for the final modifier transfer

except fairy and princess.notes: This is so that the 999 fairy and princess in the base save doesn't load in

Kakariko WMC: (?=) Only eat stam food from last slot. Otherwise you might not have enough slots to stay positive inventory count, which means weird things might happen if you don't know what you are doing

_Boss::Hinox::Stal.notes: Aim for eye and stay in BT. Might need to shoot eyeball again if you miss

.dir(NE).notes: Glide into middle to avoid opening door. If you messed up, shoot the eye across

_Boss::Hinox::Stal.notes: Press minus as soon as it explodes

Dark Beast Stuff.notes: You started with 4 potlids and 3 single wild greens. Remove 3 of them. i.e. destroy 3 potlids or eat 3 wild greens, or any combination. If you accidentally ate the wild greens, then no need to do anything

Lanayru: (==) OMEGA bow of light setup. We will also transfer 100 durability from BOL to one phrenic bow

Reload.notes: Should be at second gate house. This makes the wb to East Passage easier.

_Boss::Hinox::Stal.notes: For all stal with omega bol, shoot body once, then eye shot and stay in BT until it hits

_Boss::Hinox::Blue.notes: Be low enough to get super from this forest

.dir(SW) + .dir(SW).notes: If you forgot monster part, get it here

Lanayru: (?=) Do Not Ground For Next Branch

Lurelin: (?=) Do Not Ground For Next Branch

.dir(W).notes: Land in water and cryo block

.dir(W>) Turn.notes: Land in water and cryo block

_Boss::Talus::Stone.notes: If rain, face south and hover down. Cycle shields to make the talus load. Midair south and immediately blow up square bomb and enter BT to recharge. Then midair north and immediately enter bullet time. Fall to a height where you can snipe the talus and kill.
Sometimes it's not loaded, in which case just walk to wake it up
Might need to shoot more than once since it loads slow

.dir(<W)/.dir(W>) Turn midairs.notes: Repeated off cardinal turns to get speed

.dir(N) + .dir(N.) Turn.notes: Might need 3 wbs depending on your height

_Boss::Talus::Luminous.notes: Land to shoot if not enough height. Can also walk to wake up

.dir(S) + .dir(<W) TS.notes: Can also do 2 ordinal super if killed talus midair

.dir(<W) Turn miadir + midair.notes: Start gliding toward left of talus for BLSS, but not too much since you won't be able to shoot the talus. If you still don't have a monster part, kill the lizalfos here

BLSS.notes: Slide up hills a bit so you have enough height.

_Boss::Talus::Luminous.notes: Run toward the next blss spot while talus is getting up

_Boss::Molduga.notes: For moldugas, bomb arrow the ground in his path. Stay in BT until you see "?", then shoot with BOL

_Boss::Talus::Luminous.notes: left hand is the one on the right from Link's view

Faron/Lake/Central/Gerudo: (?=) Do Not Ground For Next Branch
